SEARCH
Package bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.service

Interface UserManagerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserManagerServiceImpl
public interface UserManagerService
The UserManagerService interface provides methods for managing users. It allows validating users, retrieving a user by username, creating, deleting, and updating users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      Map<String,User> getUsers()
      Retrieves all users.
      Returns:
      a map of users, keyed by username

    • isValidUser

      boolean isValidUser(String username, String password) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates a user based on username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      UserManagerException - if the username or password is null or empty
      IllegalArgumentException

    • getUser

      User getUser(String username) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Retrieves a user by username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      the user with the specified username
      Throws:
      UserManagerException - if the username is null or empty
      IllegalArgumentException

    • createUser

      void createUser(String username, String password, UserRole role) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the new user
      password - the password of the new user
      role - the role of the new user
      Throws:
      UserManagerException - if the username, password or role is null or empty
      IllegalArgumentException

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(String username) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deletes a user by username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be deleted
      Throws:
      UserManagerException - if the username is null or empty
      IllegalArgumentException

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Updates a user's password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      oldPassword - the old password of the user
      newPassword - the new password of the user
      Throws:
      UserManagerException - if the username, oldPassword or newPassword is null or empty
      IllegalArgumentException
